name: iA³ Template for Big Cartel
description:
The iA³ Theme for Big Cartel is based on the iA³ Theme for WordPress and has the same focus on readability and usability. Like the WordPress theme, it uses “best practice” HTML5, CSS3 and jQuery, and features the same responsive design that works equally well on a smartphone or tablet as it does in a desktop browser. Using both themes together lets you seamlessly integrate a store into your site.

The design of this theme has been featured in Media Queries, the Best Of CSS Design 2009 list by WebDesignerWall, as one of the 40-killer-minimalist-blog-designs by Spirestudios, and showcased as an Excellent Example of Great Web Typography.

Updates

  1. You will get future updates for as long as we develop it. Note that the theme only supports the features we use.
  2. We will endeavour to update the theme if any major CSS or Big Cartel problems arise.
  3. Please keep your PayPal code to make sure that you can contact us.

No matter whether you have a personal shop or a large company store, the iA³ Theme for Big Cartel will save you time, nerves and money. That’s what you pay for. A comparable custom-built theme built by iA would cost you between USD $15,000 and $25,000.

Don’t Buy This Unless…

…you have programming skills. We won’t provide support. If you don’t know how to install a Big Cartel theme or deal with simple HTML and Liquid code, DON’T BUY IT! Let me say that again: If you don’t have any programming skills THIS IS NOT FOR YOU!

Even if you find out after you bought it that you don’t like it, or that you don’t know about Big Cartel theme installations, there are no refunds. It is so cheap because we don’t provide customer support. If we had to, the price would go up considerably.

Features

  • Responsive design, that adjusts the grid/typography to window size and device resolution for optimal readability. Test it on the iPad, iPhone or Android to see all the hidden versions.
  • Templates for all Big Cartel pages and for custom pages.

name: iA³ Template for WordPress
description:
The iA³ Theme for WordPress is simple, fast and clear, with full focus on readability. It is the inspiration for the theme we currently use on the iA website. It uses standards-compliant HTML5 and CSS3, plus some tasty jQuery stuff. The HTML code follows a simple structure which helps your SEO. It comes with a fully functional iPhone/Android version.

Where’s the demo?

We have a demo WordPress installation for you to see.

Kudos

Among others, this design has been featured in 40 Killer Minimalist Blog Designs by Spirestudios, as an Excellent Example of Great Web Typography on onextrapixel, and on WebDesignerWall’s Best Of CSS Design 2009 list. It is one of the favorites at Web Design Ledger and Best Web Gallery. Lots of people use it, the most famous being Sylvester Stallone.

Updates

  1. You will get future updates for as long as we develop it.
  2. We will update it with future releases of WordPress and when we need new features, but each iA³ Theme version only works with its own WordPress release (currently 3.5) and the accompanying version of PHP (currently 5.2).
  3. We will endeavour to update the theme if any major CSS or PHP problems arise.
  4. Please keep your PayPal code to make sure that you can contact us.

No matter whether you have a personal site or are a commercial entity, an iA³ Theme will save you time, nerves and money. That’s what you pay for.

Don’t Buy This Unless…

…you have programming skills. We won’t provide support. If you don’t know how to install WordPress or deal with simple code, DON’T BUY IT! Let me say that again: If you don’t have any programming skills THIS IS NOT FOR YOU.

If you find out after you bought it that you don’t like it, or that you don’t know about WordPress installations, there is no refund. This theme is so cheap because we don’t provide customer support. If we did, the price would go up considerably.

Features

  • Responsive design, that adjusts the grid/typography to window size and device resolution for optimal readability. Test it on a tablet and a smartphone to see all the versions.
  • Settings page to easily change colors, your logo, and the header/footer navigation items
  • Templates for articles, gallery, search, tweets and contact
  • Google Map
  • Google Analytics
  • Contact form
  • Display Twitter account(s)
  • Free access to any updates
  • No plugins required
